name: Oh! Bees
description: He’s a bumblebee, but he got kicked out of his Hive! If you’re wondering why, it’s because he is too Chub-bee to fly. This wonderful arcade platformer takes you on the adventure of a bumblebee out in the wild, as he travels through a dangerous forest to pollinate all the flowers. Along the way he will meet a lot of his natural enemies. Help this Bumblebee to achieve his goals and be allowed back into his hive! Download Oh! Bees and go do your Bumble Best!
